)

826  {
827  if (!await _permissionService.AuthorizeAsync(StandardPermissionProvider.ManageProducts))
828  return AccessDeniedView();
829 
830  //validate maximum number of products per vendor
831  if (_vendorSettings.MaximumProductNumber > 0 && await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync() != null

854

873 
874  //discounts

889  string.Format(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("ActivityLog.AddNewProduct"), product.Name), product);
890

892 
893  if (!continueEditing)

897  }

976  if (previousProductType == ProductType.GroupedProduct && product.ProductType == ProductType.SimpleProduct)
977  {
978  var storeId = (await _storeContext.GetCurrentStoreAsync())?.Id ?? 0;
979  var vendorId = (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync())?.Id ?? 0;
980 
981  var associatedProducts = await _productService.GetAssociatedProductsAsync(product.Id, storeId, vendorId);
982  foreach (var associatedProduct in associatedProducts)
983  {
984  associatedProduct.ParentGroupedProductId = 0;
985  await _productService.UpdateProductAsync(associatedProduct);
986  }
987  }
988 
989  //search engine name
990  model.SeName = await _urlRecordService.ValidateSeNameAsync(product, model.SeName, product.Name, true);
991  await _urlRecordService.SaveSlugAsync(product, model.SeName, 0);
992 
993  //locales
994  await UpdateLocalesAsync(product, model);
995 
996  //tags
997  await _productTagService.UpdateProductTagsAsync(product, ParseProductTags(model.ProductTags));
998 
999  //warehouses
1000  await SaveProductWarehouseInventoryAsync(product, model);
1001 
1002  //categories
1003  await SaveCategoryMappingsAsync(product, model);
1004 
1005  //manufacturers
1006  await SaveManufacturerMappingsAsync(product, model);
1007 
1008  //ACL (customer roles)
1009  await SaveProductAclAsync(product, model);
1010 
1011  //stores
1012  await _productService.UpdateProductStoreMappingsAsync(product, model.SelectedStoreIds);
1013 
1014  //discounts
1015  await SaveDiscountMappingsAsync(product, model);
1016 
1017  //picture seo names
1018  await UpdatePictureSeoNamesAsync(product);
1019 
1020  //back in stock notifications
1021  if (product.ManageInventoryMethod == ManageInventoryMethod.ManageStock &&
1022  product.BackorderMode == BackorderMode.NoBackorders &&
1023  product.AllowBackInStockSubscriptions &&
1024  await _productService.GetTotalStockQuantityAsync(product) > 0 &&
1025  prevTotalStockQuantity <= 0 &&
1026  product.Published &&
1027  !product.Deleted)
1028  {
1029  await _backInStockSubscriptionService.SendNotificationsToSubscribersAsync(product);
1030  }
1031 
1032  //delete an old "download" file (if deleted or updated)
1033  if (prevDownloadId > 0 && prevDownloadId != product.DownloadId)
1034  {
1035  var prevDownload = await _downloadService.GetDownloadByIdAsync(prevDownloadId);
1036  if (prevDownload != null)
1037  await _downloadService.DeleteDownloadAsync(prevDownload);
1038  }
1039 
1040  //delete an old "sample download" file (if deleted or updated)
1041  if (prevSampleDownloadId > 0 && prevSampleDownloadId != product.SampleDownloadId)
1042  {
1043  var prevSampleDownload = await _downloadService.GetDownloadByIdAsync(prevSampleDownloadId);
1044  if (prevSampleDownload != null)
1045  await _downloadService.DeleteDownloadAsync(prevSampleDownload);
1046  }
1047 
1048  //quantity change history
1049  if (previousWarehouseId != product.WarehouseId)
1050  {
1051  //warehouse is changed
1052  //compose a message
1053  var oldWarehouseMessage = string.Empty;
1054  if (previousWarehouseId > 0)
1055  {
1056  var oldWarehouse = await _shippingService.GetWarehouseByIdAsync(previousWarehouseId);
1057  if (oldWarehouse != null)
1058  oldWarehouseMessage = string.Format(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.StockQuantityHistory.Messages.EditWarehouse.Old"), oldWarehouse.Name);
1059  }
1060 
1061  var newWarehouseMessage = string.Empty;
1062  if (product.WarehouseId > 0)
1063  {
1064  var newWarehouse = await _shippingService.GetWarehouseByIdAsync(product.WarehouseId);
1065  if (newWarehouse != null)
1066  newWarehouseMessage = string.Format(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.StockQuantityHistory.Messages.EditWarehouse.New"), newWarehouse.Name);
1067  }
1068 
1069  var message = string.Format(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.StockQuantityHistory.Messages.EditWarehouse"), oldWarehouseMessage, newWarehouseMessage);
1070 
1071  //record history
1072  await _productService.AddStockQuantityHistoryEntryAsync(product, -previousStockQuantity, 0, previousWarehouseId, message);
1073  await _productService.AddStockQuantityHistoryEntryAsync(product, product.StockQuantity, product.StockQuantity, product.WarehouseId, message);
1074  }
1075  else
1076  {
1077  await _productService.AddStockQuantityHistoryEntryAsync(product, product.StockQuantity - previousStockQuantity, product.StockQuantity,
1078  product.WarehouseId, await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.StockQuantityHistory.Messages.Edit"));
1079  }
1080 
1081  //activity log
1082  await _customerActivityService.InsertActivityAsync("EditProduct",
1083  string.Format(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("ActivityLog.EditProduct"), product.Name), product);
1084 
1085  _notificationService.SuccessNotification(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.Catalog.Products.Updated"));
1086 
1087  if (!continueEditing)
1088  return RedirectToAction("List");
1089 
1090  return RedirectToAction("Edit", new { id = product.Id });
1091  }
1092 
1093  //prepare model
1094  model = await _productModelFactory.PrepareProductModelAsync(model, product, true);
1095 
1096  //if we got this far, something failed, redisplay form
1097  return View(model);
1098  }

358  {
359  var attributesXml = string.Empty;
360 
361  //get product attribute mappings (exclude non-combinable attributes)
362  var attributes = (await _productAttributeService.GetProductAttributeMappingsByProductIdAsync(productId))
363  .Where(productAttributeMapping => !productAttributeMapping.IsNonCombinable()).ToList();
364 
365  foreach (var attribute in attributes)
366  {
367  var controlId = $"{NopCatalogDefaults.ProductAttributePrefix}{attribute.Id}";
368  StringValues ctrlAttributes;
369 
370  switch (attribute.AttributeControlType)
371  {
372  case AttributeControlType.DropdownList:
373  case AttributeControlType.RadioList:
374  case AttributeControlType.ColorSquares:
375  case AttributeControlType.ImageSquares:
376  ctrlAttributes = form[controlId];
377  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ctrlAttributes))
378  {
379  var selectedAttributeId = int.Parse(ctrlAttributes);
380  if (selectedAttributeId > 0)
381  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(attributesXml,
382  attribute, selectedAttributeId.ToString());
383  }
384 
385  break;
386  case AttributeControlType.Checkboxes:
387  var cblAttributes = form[controlId].ToString();
388  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(cblAttributes))
389  {
390  foreach (var item in cblAttributes.Split(new[] { ',' },
391  StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries))
392  {
393  var selectedAttributeId = int.Parse(item);
394  if (selectedAttributeId > 0)
395  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(attributesXml,
396  attribute, selectedAttributeId.ToString());
397  }
398  }
399 
400  break;
401  case AttributeControlType.ReadonlyCheckboxes:
402  //load read-only (already server-side selected) values
403  var attributeValues = await _productAttributeService.GetProductAttributeValuesAsync(attribute.Id);
404  foreach (var selectedAttributeId in attributeValues
405  .Where(v => v.IsPreSelected)
406  .Select(v => v.Id)
407  .ToList())
408  {
409  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(attributesXml,
410  attribute, selectedAttributeId.ToString());
411  }
412 
413  break;
414  case AttributeControlType.TextBox:
415  case AttributeControlType.MultilineTextbox:
416  ctrlAttributes = form[controlId];
417  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ctrlAttributes))
418  {
419  var enteredText = ctrlAttributes.ToString().Trim();
420  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(attributesXml,
421  attribute, enteredText);
422  }
423 
424  break;
425  case AttributeControlType.Datepicker:
426  var date = form[controlId + "_day"];
427  var month = form[controlId + "_month"];
428  var year = form[controlId + "_year"];
429  DateTime? selectedDate = null;
430  try
431  {
432  selectedDate = new DateTime(int.Parse(year), int.Parse(month), int.Parse(date));
433  }
434  catch
435  {
436  //ignore any exception
437  }
438 
439  if (selectedDate.HasValue)
440  {
441  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(attributesXml,
442  attribute, selectedDate.Value.ToString("D"));
443  }
444 
445  break;
446  case AttributeControlType.FileUpload:
447  var httpPostedFile = Request.Form.Files[controlId];
448  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(httpPostedFile?.FileName))
449  {
450  var fileSizeOk = true;
451  if (attribute.ValidationFileMaximumSize.HasValue)
452  {
453  //compare in bytes
454  var maxFileSizeBytes = attribute.ValidationFileMaximumSize.Value * 1024;
455  if (httpPostedFile.Length > maxFileSizeBytes)
456  {
457  warnings.Add(string.Format(
458  await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("ShoppingCart.MaximumUploadedFileSize"),
459  attribute.ValidationFileMaximumSize.Value));
460  fileSizeOk = false;
461  }
462  }
463 
464  if (fileSizeOk)
465  {
466  //save an uploaded file
467  var download = new Download
468  {
469  DownloadGuid = Guid.NewGuid(),
470  UseDownloadUrl = false,
471  DownloadUrl = string.Empty,
472  DownloadBinary = await _downloadService.GetDownloadBitsAsync(httpPostedFile),
473  ContentType = httpPostedFile.ContentType,
474  Filename = _fileProvider.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(httpPostedFile.FileName),
475  Extension = _fileProvider.GetFileExtension(httpPostedFile.FileName),
476  IsNew = true
477  };
478  await _downloadService.InsertDownloadAsync(download);
479 
480  //save attribute
481  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(attributesXml,
482  attribute, download.DownloadGuid.ToString());
483  }
484  }
485 
486  break;
487  default:
488  break;
489  }
490  }
491 
492  //validate conditional attributes (if specified)
493  foreach (var attribute in attributes)
494  {
495  var conditionMet = await _productAttributeParser.IsConditionMetAsync(attribute, attributesXml);
496  if (conditionMet.HasValue && !conditionMet.Value)
497  {
498  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.RemoveProductAttribute(attributesXml, attribute);
499  }
500  }
501 
502  return attributesXml;
503  }

virtual async Task<IActionResult> Nop.Web.Areas.Admin.Controllers.ProductController.ProductAttributeMappingDelete ( int  id)
virtual
2759  {
2760  if (!await _permissionService.AuthorizeAsync(StandardPermissionProvider.ManageProducts))
2761  return AccessDeniedView();
2762 
2763  //try to get a product attribute mapping with the specified id
2764  var productAttributeMapping = await _productAttributeService.GetProductAttributeMappingByIdAsync(id)
2765  ?? throw new ArgumentException("No product attribute mapping found with the specified id");
2766 
2767  //try to get a product with the specified id
2768  var product = await _productService.GetProductByIdAsync(productAttributeMapping.ProductId)
2769  ?? throw new ArgumentException("No product found with the specified id");
2770 
2771  //a vendor should have access only to his products
2772  if (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync() != null && product.VendorId != (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync()).Id)
2773  return Content("This is not your product");
2774 
2775  //check if existed combinations contains the specified attribute
2776  var existedCombinations = await _productAttributeService.GetAllProductAttributeCombinationsAsync(product.Id);
2777  if (existedCombinations?.Any() == true)
2778  {
2779  foreach (var combination in existedCombinations)
2780  {
2781  var mappings = await _productAttributeParser
2782  .ParseProductAttributeMappingsAsync(combination.AttributesXml);
2783 
2784  if (mappings?.Any(m => m.Id == productAttributeMapping.Id) == true)
2785  {
2786  _notificationService.ErrorNotification(
2787  string.Format(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.Catalog.Products.ProductAttributes.Attributes.AlreadyExistsInCombination"),
2788  await _productAttributeFormatter.FormatAttributesAsync(product, combination.AttributesXml, await _workContext.GetCurrentCustomerAsync(), ", ")));
2789 
2790  return RedirectToAction("ProductAttributeMappingEdit", new { id = productAttributeMapping.Id });
2791  }
2792  }
2793  }
2794 
2795  await _productAttributeService.DeleteProductAttributeMappingAsync(productAttributeMapping);
2796 
2797  _notificationService.SuccessNotification(await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.Catalog.Products.ProductAttributes.Attributes.Deleted"));
2798 
2799  //select an appropriate card
2800  SaveSelectedCardName("product-product-attributes");
2801  return RedirectToAction("Edit", new { id = productAttributeMapping.ProductId });
2802  }

1864  var psa = await _specificationAttributeService.GetProductSpecificationAttributeByIdAsync(model.SpecificationId);
1865  if (psa == null)
1866  {
1867  //select an appropriate card
1868  SaveSelectedCardName("product-specification-attributes");
1869  _notificationService.ErrorNotification("No product specification attribute found with the specified id");
1870 
1871  return RedirectToAction("Edit", new { id = model.ProductId });
1872  }
1873 
1874  //a vendor should have access only to his products
1875  if (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync() != null
1876  && (await _productService.GetProductByIdAsync(psa.ProductId)).VendorId != (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync()).Id)
1877  {
1878  _notificationService.ErrorNotification("This is not your product");
1879 
1880  return RedirectToAction("List");
1881  }
1882 
1883  //we allow filtering and change option only for "Option" attribute type
1884  //save localized values for CustomHtmlText and CustomText
1885  switch (model.AttributeTypeId)
1886  {
1887  case (int)SpecificationAttributeType.Option:
1888  psa.AllowFiltering = model.AllowFiltering;
1889  psa.SpecificationAttributeOptionId = model.SpecificationAttributeOptionId;
1890 
1891  break;
1892  case (int)SpecificationAttributeType.CustomHtmlText:
1893  psa.CustomValue = model.ValueRaw;
1894  foreach (var localized in model.Locales)
1895  {
1896  await _localizedEntityService.SaveLocalizedValueAsync(psa,
1897  x => x.CustomValue,
1898  localized.ValueRaw,
1899  localized.LanguageId);
1900  }
1901 
1902  break;
1903  case (int)SpecificationAttributeType.CustomText:
1904  psa.CustomValue = model.Value;
1905  foreach (var localized in model.Locales)
1906  {
1907  await _localizedEntityService.SaveLocalizedValueAsync(psa,
1908  x => x.CustomValue,
1909  localized.Value,
1910  localized.LanguageId);
1911  }
1912 
1913  break;
1914  default:
1915  psa.CustomValue = model.Value;
1916 
1917  break;
1918  }
1919 
1920  psa.ShowOnProductPage = model.ShowOnProductPage;
1921  psa.DisplayOrder = model.DisplayOrder;
1922  await _specificationAttributeService.UpdateProductSpecificationAttributeAsync(psa);
1923 
1924  if (continueEditing)
1925  {
1926  return RedirectToAction("ProductSpecAttributeAddOrEdit",
1927  new { productId = psa.ProductId, specificationId = model.SpecificationId });
1928  }
1929 
1930  //select an appropriate card
1931  SaveSelectedCardName("product-specification-attributes");
1932 
1933  return RedirectToAction("Edit", new { id = psa.ProductId });
1934  }

1764  {

1766  return AccessDeniedView();
1767 
1768  var product = await _productService.GetProductByIdAsync(model.ProductId);
1769  if (product == null)
1770  {
1771  _notificationService.ErrorNotification("No product found with the specified id");
1772  return RedirectToAction("List");
1773  }
1774 
1775  //a vendor should have access only to his products
1776  if (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync() != null && product.VendorId != (await _workContext.GetCurrentVendorAsync()).Id)
1777  {
1778  return RedirectToAction("List");
1779  }
1780 
1781  //we allow filtering only for "Option" attribute type
1782  if (model.AttributeTypeId != (int)SpecificationAttributeType.Option)
1783  model.AllowFiltering = false;
1784 
1785  //we don't allow CustomValue for "Option" attribute type
1786  if (model.AttributeTypeId == (int)SpecificationAttributeType.Option)
1787  model.ValueRaw = null;
1788 
1789  //store raw html if field allow this
1790  if (model.AttributeTypeId == (int)SpecificationAttributeType.CustomText
1791  || model.AttributeTypeId == (int)SpecificationAttributeType.Hyperlink)
1792  model.ValueRaw = model.Value;
1793

1795  psa.CustomValue = model.ValueRaw;

1797

1799  {
1800  case SpecificationAttributeType.CustomText:
1801  foreach (var localized in model.Locales)
1802  {
1803  await _localizedEntityService.SaveLocalizedValueAsync(psa,
1804  x => x.CustomValue,
1805  localized.Value,
1806  localized.LanguageId);
1807  }
1808 
1809  break;
1810  case SpecificationAttributeType.CustomHtmlText:
1811  foreach (var localized in model.Locales)
1812  {
1813  await _localizedEntityService.SaveLocalizedValueAsync(psa,
1814  x => x.CustomValue,
1815  localized.ValueRaw,
1816  localized.LanguageId);
1817  }
1818 
1819  break;
1820  case SpecificationAttributeType.Option:
1821  break;
1822  case SpecificationAttributeType.Hyperlink:
1823  break;
1824  default:
1825  throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();
1826  }
1827 
1828  if (continueEditing)
1829  return RedirectToAction("ProductSpecAttributeAddOrEdit",
1830  new { productId = psa.ProductId, specificationId = psa.Id });
1831 
1832  //select an appropriate card
1833  SaveSelectedCardName("product-specification-attributes");

629  switch (attribute.AttributeControlType)

632  case AttributeControlType.RadioList:

668  attribute, selectedAttributeId.ToString());

670  }
671

675  //otherwise "attributesXml" will be empty
676  //hence we won't be able to find a selected attribute
677  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(null,
678  attribute, string.Empty);
679  }
680  }
681  else
682  {
683  //for conditions we should save empty values even when nothing is selected
684  //otherwise "attributesXml" will be empty
685  //hence we won't be able to find a selected attribute
686  attributesXml = _productAttributeParser.AddProductAttribute(null,
687  attribute, string.Empty);
688  }
689 
690  break;

692  case AttributeControlType.TextBox:
693  case AttributeControlType.MultilineTextbox:
694  case AttributeControlType.Datepicker:

696  default:

◆ SaveProductWarehouseInventoryAsync()

virtual async Task Nop.Web.Areas.Admin.Controllers.ProductController.SaveProductWarehouseInventoryAsync ( Product  product,
ProductModel  model 
)

521  {
522  if (product == null)
523  throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(product));
524 
525  if (model.ManageInventoryMethodId != (int)ManageInventoryMethod.ManageStock)
526  return;
527 
528  if (!model.UseMultipleWarehouses)
529  return;
530 
531  var warehouses = await _shippingService.GetAllWarehousesAsync();
532 
533  var formData = Request.Form.ToDictionary(x => x.Key, x => x.Value.ToString());
534 
535  foreach (var warehouse in warehouses)
536  {
537  //parse stock quantity
538  var stockQuantity = 0;
539  foreach (var formKey in formData.Keys)
540  {
541  if (!formKey.Equals($"warehouse_qty_{warehouse.Id}", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
542  continue;
543 
544  int.TryParse(formData[formKey], out stockQuantity);
545  break;
546  }
547 
548  //parse reserved quantity
549  var reservedQuantity = 0;
550  foreach (var formKey in formData.Keys)
551  if (formKey.Equals($"warehouse_reserved_{warehouse.Id}", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
552  {
553  int.TryParse(formData[formKey], out reservedQuantity);
554  break;
555  }
556 
557  //parse "used" field
558  var used = false;
559  foreach (var formKey in formData.Keys)
560  if (formKey.Equals($"warehouse_used_{warehouse.Id}", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
561  {
562  int.TryParse(formData[formKey], out var tmp);
563  used = tmp == warehouse.Id;
564  break;
565  }
566 
567  //quantity change history message
568  var message = $"{await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.StockQuantityHistory.Messages.MultipleWarehouses")} {await _localizationService.GetResourceAsync("Admin.StockQuantityHistory.Messages.Edit")}";
569 
570  var existingPwI = (await _productService.GetAllProductWarehouseInventoryRecordsAsync(product.Id)).FirstOrDefault(x => x.WarehouseId == warehouse.Id);
571  if (existingPwI != null)
572  {
573  if (used)
574  {
575  var previousStockQuantity = existingPwI.StockQuantity;
576 
577  //update existing record
578  existingPwI.StockQuantity = stockQuantity;
579  existingPwI.ReservedQuantity = reservedQuantity;
580  await _productService.UpdateProductWarehouseInventoryAsync(existingPwI);
581 
582  //quantity change history
583  await _productService.AddStockQuantityHistoryEntryAsync(product, existingPwI.StockQuantity - previousStockQuantity, existingPwI.StockQuantity,
584  existingPwI.WarehouseId, message);
585  }
586  else
587  {
588  //delete. no need to store record for qty 0
589  await _productService.DeleteProductWarehouseInventoryAsync(existingPwI);
590 
591  //quantity change history
592  await _productService.AddStockQuantityHistoryEntryAsync(product, -existingPwI.StockQuantity, 0, existingPwI.WarehouseId, message);
593  }
594  }
595  else
596  {
597  if (!used)
598  continue;
599 
600  //no need to insert a record for qty 0
601  existingPwI = new ProductWarehouseInventory
602  {
603  WarehouseId = warehouse.Id,
604  ProductId = product.Id,
605  StockQuantity = stockQuantity,
606  ReservedQuantity = reservedQuantity
607  };
608 
609  await _productService.InsertProductWarehouseInventoryAsync(existingPwI);
610 
611  //quantity change history
612  await _productService.AddStockQuantityHistoryEntryAsync(product, existingPwI.StockQuantity, existingPwI.StockQuantity,
613  existingPwI.WarehouseId, message);
614  }
615  }
616  }
